title: Everyday
lyrics: Tông  yeong hwana bollae jojo neo man johdamyeon nan gogo (gogossing) dae dabhae geunyang oh oh (She says, “Yes”) tikes du jang-eun lotto neo hwajanghaji ma, baebulleo deo ippeojimyeon nan aembyulleon seu kkocheul jwin geon Only one That's you, you woo wee neon naui jong-gyo, iljuil maeil yeongjeobhal su issdamyeon maeili juil woo wee dodaeche neon mwonde binteumi eobsne jal usdaga do tolajimyeon maeumi apawa I want you to love me, oh till I die yeah da gajyeo ga wonhandamyeon nae modeun oneureul, Babe neon bwado, bwado kkeuti an bo yeo neon pado, pado maeil saero wo wol hwa su mog geum to il gaji gon bu joghae harureul deo mandeul ji gyeong Every day, day, every, every day (With u, with u, with u) Every day, day, every, every day (With me, with me, with me) Every day, day, every, every day (il ju, il ju, iljuil) Every day, day, every, every day (Everyday, yeah) pija, paseutaneun So so (yum, yum) neo ga wonham nan gogo (gogossing) su eob machigo togtog (togtog) mannamyeon bangabdago ppoppo (chu) miso hanbange jeong sini pigpigpig jeonhwagin gyesog ringringring yeosachin ijen da bbb jeonglihago nege olininin Everyday gidohae 365il nae ireum daesin bulleojwo, My boy jumeonie jjilleo neoh-eun son kkeonaeseo nae sonjaba jwo dodaeche neon mwonde binteumi eobsne jal usdaga do tolajimyeon maeumi apawa I want you to love me, oh till I die yeah da gajyeo ga wonhandamyeon nae modeun oneuleul, Babe Neon bwado, bwado kkeuti an bo yeo Neon pado, pado maeil saero wo Wol hwa su mog geum to il gaji gon Bu joghae harureul deo mandeul ji gyeong Every day, day, every, every day (With u, with u, with u) Every day, day, every, every day (With me, with me, with me) Every day, day, every, every day (il ju, il ju, iljuil) Every day, day, every, every day (Everyday, yeah) jami mwoga pil yohae nega pil yohae nan neo waui sigani da yagi laseo hanado an pi gonhae ani bu joghae deo gak kai iri wa neol wonhae, wonhae, wonhae, deo Every day, day, every, every day (With u, with u, with u) Every day, day, every, every day (With me, with me, with me) Every day, day, every, every day (il ju, il ju, iljuil) Every day, day, every, every day (Everyday, yeah)
